TextView.android:text: A well known library we can use to process payments is Stripe. First we import the library into our project via the app gradle file. Then we create a card form or use the CardInputWidget that Stripe provides. After the user enters his card's details, we retrieve them from the form and hit the Stripe API to obtain a token in exchange. We then use that token to form a call to a server of our own that contains the private stripe API key (cannot be stored in the app for security reasons) and our server makes the final call to the Stripe API.
